data-processing-contact: Contact form (name, email, message) via email to my inbox; stored for up to 2 years.
data-processing-terminal: Terminal interactions: commands and timestamps for analytics/security.
data-processing-quiz: Quiz progress stored locally on your device (e.g., localStorage/cookies).
data-processing-ip: Possible IP logging for security/DDOS protection (minimal, only if needed).
data-processing-websocket: Blockchain websocket currently processes no personal data.
data-processing-links: External links (GitHub, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, etc.) open third-party sites outside my control.
legal-bases-consent: Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) for contact form and optional features.
legal-bases-legitimate-interest: Legitimate interests (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR) for security, abuse prevention, service reliability, and minimal logging.
legal-bases-contract: Contract-like communication steps (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR) when you request a response.
retention-contact: Contact messages: up to 2 years, then deletion unless longer retention is legally required.
retention-terminal: Terminal logs and security logs: only as long as needed for analysis/security, then deletion or anonymization.
rights-access: Access, rectification, deletion, restriction, portability where applicable.
rights-erasure: Deletion where legal basis no longer applies.
rights-objection: Objection to processing based on legitimate interests and withdrawal of consent at any time.
rights-complaint: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (e.g., your local DPA in the EU).
rights-contact: To exercise your rights or request deletion, email info@davidwesch.de.
minors-text: This site targets visitors 16+. Please do not submit data if you are under 16.
cookies-text: Planned quizzes may store progress locally on your device (e.g., cookies/localStorage). No third-party trackers are used at this time.
security-text: Security measures include restricted logging and optional IP capture solely for abuse/attack prevention. No analytics services are active.
external-links-text: Linked sites (e.g., GitHub, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn) are third-party services with their own privacy policies.
consent-contact-label: I confirm I am 16+ and agree to the privacy notice.
